name: Undead Planet: Zombie
description:
Evil, hell fire, vicious, violent, top down shooter with zombies, high quality top level graphics! blood and violence to be expected! they are coming. end!

Hell is loose. Bringing back ZOMBIES!! Your mission in this hellish world, Is to kill the zombies and send them crying back to hell! Thrown into the fires, Fight and survive this hellish landscape and its zombified villains. This is a exciting new shooter with unique arsenals at the disposal. blood. evil. hell fire. end.

Vicious, violent soldier based story shooter game where hell is unleashed and zombies are brought back to life. Your goal is to fight the zombies and kill them in glorious fashion, Not a moment to spare, Pick up weapon and bring some blood violence in this top down shooter! evil! they are coming.

EARN COINS 

Earn as you stop the zombies, Every kill grants you coins, Spend em wisely. Zombie heads. 

KEY Features

■top down shooter

■offline

■action games

■blood 

■violence

■violent

■hell

STORY

Evil hell has broken loose and is bringing back the dead, Your mission is simple, To exterminate the hellish feinds. Expect heart stopping action and intense, Awesome blood filled game-play through out various landscapes. Expect things to get violent with violence. kill them all! they are coming. hell fire. end!

TOP DOWN SHOOTER

Vicious single player, offline, top down shooter, filled with violence and blood, expect things to get messy. Exciting story and bloody action make this game a must have! hell! end!
